content.question: In line 2, bis Pergameis erepte ruinis is translated

choices.label: twice snatched from the Trojan ruins
with the Trojan ruins snatched away twice
snatch yourself from the Trojan ruins twice
snatch the Trojans away from the ruins twice

content.answer: twice snatched from the Trojan ruins

unit.text: 5: Vergil's Aeneid, Excerpts from Books 4, 6, 7, 11, and 12
